traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the queen fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The queen makes two attacks: one with her shortsword and one with her thornwhip, or two attacks with her longbow.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Thorn Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if the Queen is not already grappling a creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (3d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. If the queen uses this attack while a target is already grappled, she may pull the target to her and deal an additional 9 (2d4 +4) piercing damage automatically.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Hail of Thorns (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The queen launches a volley of deadly thorns in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Strike
legendary.desc: The queen makes an attack with her shortsword or her longbow.

legendary.name: Swift Repositioning
legendary.desc: The queen can move up to half of her movement speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.
